WRITING.TITLE: AMD or Intel
WRITING.TEXT: I'm buying a new pc and I was wondering which one is better. I mostly play CS:GO and it needs more CPU than GPU. So i built 2 examples and I want to ask you which one would run better overall. Also i might do video editing and maybe stream in the future. Here is the AMD build https://pcpartpicker.com/user/Aranaar/saved/3vNbvK and the Intel+amd https://pcpartpicker.com/user/Aranaar/saved/rrtD3C . I would like to see your opinion and if can advise me to change something maybe. P.S I know that most of you will be Intel fanboys so I want a serious neutral opinion. :)
Thank you very much. It helped a lot.
That's exactly what I needed. And yes I'm planing to overclock. Thank you!

WRITING.TITLE: [QUESTION] [NEWBIE] First acoustic guitar.
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, my birthday is next week and i have dreamed a lot about a guitar so i decided to buy one. This will be my first guitar and im not sure what to buy. I wanted an acoustic guitar and for now i'm liking 3 - SQUIER SA-105, Stagg SA30A and Stagg SA20ACE which is electric-acoustic. My question is do i need an electric-acoustic or just an acoustic and which one do you think will be better! Also the shapes are different and i have heard that the Dreadnought guitars are louder and i need more quiet one because i live in a flat with other people and i dont want to disturb them. If you have any other suggestions around that price range (80euro-100euro) share them. :)

WRITING.TITLE: First acoustic guitar.
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, my birthday is next week and i wanted to buy a guitar for long time so i decided to buy one. This will be my first guitar and I'm not sure what to buy. For now I'm liking 3 - Squier SA-105, Stagg SA30A and Stagg SA20ACE which is "electric-acoustic". Do i need an electric-acoustic or just an acoustic and which one of them is better? Also the shapes are different and i have heard that the Dreadnought guitars (the Squier SA-105) are louder but i need something more quiet because I live in a flat with other people and i dont want to disturb anyone. If you have any other suggestions around that price range (80euro-100euro) share them. :)

A lot of people like the squier actually i could't find much about the stagg though. In my country there arent many second hand stores. And I dont want to give more money because it will be my first one and i dont know if im going to stick with it. i think that i will get the Squier to learn how to play and in the future i might buy something with better quality. Thank you for the comment though. :)
Thank you. I think i will go with the Squier because a lot of people are liking them while i couldn't find any reviews about the Staggs.
Thanks! I dont have much free time but i spend most of it playing the guitar. Maybe I should make a routine. :)

WRITING.TITLE: Subtitles problem
WRITING.TEXT: The subtitles are shit. the first half of the movie there are no subtitles and when the movie is about to end the subtitles start. I tried to sync them manually but its hard have to spam shift+G for ages to get them right because they are 1 hour ahead of the movie. Good fucking job popcorn time

If they cant do the job done why are they even doing this? there are millions of sites that do their job better. Its not that hard to just sync the subs. There is no point in useing their shitty software when people can watch movies from other easier to use and better softwares and sites. Im pointing out their cons so they can fix them.
its a condom

WRITING.TITLE: i want freedom
WRITING.TEXT: So im 16yo boy. My parents decided to rent a villa with their frinds to celebrate the new year. And they are all 40+ and I wanted to stay home and make my own plans. But my mother refused to let me stay home alone for new year. However my sister at my age was allowed to make parties and make her plans to celebrate christmas and new year with her friends. Im literally doing nothing here they are all old and i dont have anybody to talk with im just chatting on my phone non stop from 2 days because im just staying in my room and not getting out because i dont have anything else to do. I have no idea why they dont have faith in me they never gave me a chance to proof anything. Im not 12 anymore im old enought to celebrate with friends. Im like in jail just wasting my time doing nothing. People on my age go to clubs get drunk and smoke. And here i do none of that just want to spend the holidays being happy. They will always do something to fuck up my plans. I didnt even had chance to choose if i want to go or no.

WRITING.TITLE: What does she want?
WRITING.TEXT: So there is this girl with which i had relationship but after we broke up we stayed friends. We are not so close anymore though but recently she started talking alot with me about life. Just for no reason started talking about her life and her friends and even started a topic about suicide. We are not very close and i didnt have much to say but she didn't stop talking like she hadnt talked with anybody in years even though she has bf and lots of friends. I have no idea whats happening in her life now. Should i be worried? Why did she chose me to talk with? does she want to get close with me again? Ive been cold with her since we broke up and now i dont know what to do because she just contacted me out of nowhere.
Not really, just dont want to be that direct.

For me its not that big of a deal. I have no IRL friends however i spend my time with people i met trough internet and thay are a lot better friends than anybody i knew IRL. But im introvert and im happy even when i dont communicate with people.

WRITING.TITLE: Brush problem
WRITING.TEXT: Any idea why the hell my brush does this??? http://prntscr.com/i61ro4
I just reseted the brush and it fixed it. I might have just pressed something accidently while working thanks anyway.
Im into gaming. my team broke apart.
This is the problem. Everything is going down. I dont feel like im improoving anymore and at the same time i dont want to do anything else.
is there gonna be a big performance drop in the games. Because the intel gets better ratings in benchmarks.
Yeah i know that but will i get less fps in games with the ryzen than with the intel?

Thanks for the response. You are totally right. I was thinking that they are so used to me not wanting anything so they take me for granted. Also i have never argued with them and accepted everything they tell me so maybe if i step my ground and tell them what i think and how i feel they will start to apriciate me more.
its not only in the site it didnt give me any in the game too

https://osu.bitti.io/ this site says that it shouldve given me at 24pp i got 0 and i tried it with other maps that gave me pp and still didnt give me as much as the site says. (and yes i type the real values)
It should be a bug because now i noticed that in the "ranks" section it gives me the right amount of pp but in the ingame pp it doesn't.

WRITING.TITLE: What order?
WRITING.TEXT: Can somebody explain me in which order should i watch it. I just finished with Sword art online and now i dont know whats after it the extra edition or Sao II or Sao offline?

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for animeish MMORPG
WRITING.TEXT: So I've been looking for some simple mmorpg with simple fighting mechanics by that i mean to have little spells and attacks and most of the fighting happens by click one button something like SoulWorker or Archblade. I would prefer to have combinations rather than spells. I've played SoulWorker but the only thing i like about it is its mechanics. There is one game KurtzPel thats coming out soon but i want to play something till they release it.
Thanks a lot for the fast response. I will check it out.
